scripts.start: node -e "require('os').platform() === 'win32' ? process.platform === 'win32' && process.env.TERM === 'msys' ? require('child_process').spawn('bash', ['./start.sh'], {stdio:'inherit'}) : require('child_process').spawn('cmd.exe', ['/c', 'start.bat'], {stdio:'inherit'}) : require('child_process').spawn('bash', ['./start.sh'], {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "next start -p 3001" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && cd frontend && npm run lint
